text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the Intel Core i7. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The keyboard is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the Lenovo Legion Y540-15IRH-PG0 81SY0005US 15.6" Gaming Notebook - 1920 x 1080 - Core i7 i7-9750H - 16 GB RAM - 1 TB HDD - 256 GB SSD - Black!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The Intel Core i7 in the Lenovo Legion Y540-15IRH-PG0 81SY0005US 15.6" Gaming Notebook - 1920 x 1080 - Core i7 i7-9750H - 16 GB RAM - 1 TB HDD - 256 GB SSD - Black is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Starfield and Apex Legends. The build quality of the Lenovo Legion Y540-15IRH-PG0 81SY0005US 15.6" Gaming Notebook - 1920 x 1080 - Core i7 i7-9750H - 16 GB RAM - 1 TB HDD - 256 GB SSD - Black is solid, and the build material is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
